short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Maximize your team potential, anywhere you go!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Yess.ai Chrome extension lets the user communicate more effectively inside Gmail, and Linkedin.

You must have an account on Yess.ai, and be signed in for the extension to work.
